bug.author: yds05
bug.summary: Investigate and fix the logger.debug issue on Kubeflow mode with AKS/AzureFileStorage
bug.description:
Short summary about the issue/question: Error thrown in trials running on AKS/Azure File Storage platform: ERROR [ { Error: read ECONNRESET at TLSWrap.onStreamRead (internal/stream_base_commons.js:111:27) errno: 'ECONNRESET', code: 'ECONNRESET', syscall: ' read' } ] ERROR [ 'Error: read ECONNRESET\n at TLSWrap.onStreamRead (internal/stream_base_commons.js:1 11:27)' ] ERROR [ 'Create directory failed:, Error: read ECONNRESET' ] nni Environment:
nni version: v0.9 nni mode(local|pai|remote): Kubeflow OS: Ubuntu python version: 3.6 is conda or virtualenv used?: is running in docker?:
